description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee
set of trials – different trials for the same participant generally done on different days to minimize carryover effects
condition presented to the participant -  sharing(experimenter looked at the participant when the video started) / observing (experimenter made a brief eye contact when the video ended)
which condition was presented first -  sharing _first / observing_first
time in seconds it took the participant to approach the experimenter
